LanguageData.BM_MinHandlingLevel_Title: Minimum handling level to spawn with mount (Min: {0} Max: {1} Default: {2} Current: {3})
LanguageData.BM_MinHandlingLevel_Description: Enemy and guest pawns will not arrive upon a mount unless they have at least this much skill in animal handling.
LanguageData.BM_InBiomeWeight_Title: Enemy mount from your biome chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.BM_InBiomeWeight_Description: The chance a mount used by an enemy pawn is one from your biome.
LanguageData.BM_OutBiomeWeight_Title: Enemy mount from any biome chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.BM_OutBiomeWeight_Description: The chance a mount used by an enemy pawn is one from any biome.
LanguageData.BM_NonWildWeight_Title: Domestic animals chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.BM_NonWildWeight_Description: The chance a mount used by an enemy pawn is a commonly domesticated creature.
LanguageData.BM_EnemyMountChance_Title: Enemy pawn mount chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.BM_EnemyMountChance_Description: Chance that a given enemy pawn has a mount during a raid.
LanguageData.BM_EnemyMountChanceTribal_Title: Enemy pre-industrial pawn mount chance (Min: {0}% Max: {1}% Default: {2}% Current: {3}%)
LanguageData.BM_EnemyMountChanceTribal_Description: Chance that a given pre-industrial enemy pawn has a mount during a raid.
